How To Set Up A Business Youtube Account

Luckily, it’s not hard to make a YouTube account. Every day, people make a lot of money by posting videos on YouTube. If you want to know how to set up a YouTube channel that has a hidden subscriber, read on.

If you have ever ask the following questions;

  • Where are the settings for YouTube?
  • How can I Sign up for YouTube,
  • Where is YouTube account link?
  • Can I start a YouTube channel with a business email account
  • Is a YouTube Business Channel free?
  • How do Youtubers get paid

Don’t worry, we’ll take care of you.

Setting up a YouTube account

How to use your Google account to set up a YouTube channel?

You can watch, share, and comment on YouTube videos if you have a Google account. But Google accounts don’t make YouTube channels by themselves. Setting up a new channel is easy and doesn’t take long.

  • Sign up for an account on YouTube.
  • Go to youtube.com and click “Sign In” in the top right corner of the page:
  • Then sign in with the Google account you want to be linked to your channel:
  • Go to where you set up your YouTube account.
  • Click on your profile icon in the upper right corner of the screen, and then click “Create a channel.”
  • Get your channel set up.

Next, you’ll be able to choose between making a personal channel or one with a business or other name. For this example, we’ll choose the “Use custom name” option, which is best for small businesses and brands.

Set up a YouTube channel without a Google account

Before you can use YouTube, you’ll need to set up a Google account if you don’t already have one. Just follow the steps below to do this:

  • First, go to YouTube.com.
  • Click “Login.”
  • Now, choose the option to make a Google account.
  • Create your Google account by following the steps.

Now that you have a Google account, you can use the steps above to make a YouTube channel.

YouTube Account Link

 How To Get A Custom Youtube URL For Your Account

  • Sign in to your account on YouTube.
  • Go to “Advanced Account Settings” by clicking on your profile picture in the top right corner, selecting “Settings,” and then selecting “Advanced Settings” from the menu on the left.
  • Click the “You’re eligible for a custom URL” link under Channel Settings. Keep in mind that this link will only show up if you qualify for a custom URL, as explained above.
  • The “Get custom URL” box will show you the custom URLs you can use. You can’t change what’s in the grey box, but you can change everything else to make the link your own.
  • Read the “Custom URL Terms of Use” section to make sure you understand the rules, and then click “Change URL.”
  • Make sure the URL you typed in is correct, and then click “Confirm choice.”
  • If someone types in the URL “youtube.com/custom address,” for example, they will now be taken to the homepage of your channel.

How to Switch to YouTube Channel Visibility Between Public, Private, and Unlisted

  • Open the app for YouTube.
  • Touch Library, then tap Your videos.
  • Tap More and then Edit next to the video you want to change.
  • Touch Visibility and choose between Public, Private, and Unlisted.
  • Tap SAVE.

How To Set Up A Business Youtube Account

Don’t worry if you’ve never used YouTube before. The process is pretty easy, and it only takes a few minutes to set up your channel.

  • Sign in to a Google account you already have or make a new one just for your YouTube business channel.
  • Go to YouTube’s main page and set up the name of your business channel
  • Add more information to your business account.
  • Set up the icon and artwork for your channel.
  • Fill out your channel description.
  • Set up channels and activities to be highlighted.
  • You’re ready to start putting content on your website!

After you’ve set up your account, the last piece of the puzzle is to keep optimizing your channel and content. When you’re ready to post your first video, we’ll quickly go over a few tips that will help you get more views and traffic.
